metadata.title: CVE-2020-0431 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In kbd_keycode of keyboard.c, there is a possible out of bounds write dueto a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-144161459

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
